episodes.title: A Deep Dive into the Zizian Rationalist Cult
episodes.description:
What started as an online community focused on AI, philosophy, and rational thinking took a dark turn—leading to cult-like behaviour, disappearances, and even murder. The Zizians, led by Jack 'Ziz' LaSota, were once just a fringe group, but recent events have brought them back into the spotlight. With shocking arrests, a deadly shootout, and new charges tied to multiple crimes, this story is still unfolding. Let’s take a deep dive into one of the strangest and most disturbing cases to come out of the rationalist movement.

Sources: 
https://www.bbc.com/news/articles/cy83958r2d0o

https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2025/2/18/judge-orders-leaders-of-cult-like-zizian-group-to-be-held-without-bail

https://www.wired.com/story/delirious-violent-impossible-true-story-zizians/

https://www.pbs.org/newshour/nation/a-timeline-of-cultlike-zizian-group-tied-to-killing-of-a-border-patrol-agent-in-vermont

https://www.pbs.org/newshour/nation/a-timeline-of-cultlike-zizian-group-tied-to-killing-of-a-border-patrol-agent-in-vermont

https://www.independent.co.uk/news/world/americas/crime/zizian-murders-david-maland-curtis-lind-b2701101.html

episodes.title: The Kenyan Massacre That No One Saw Coming – What Went Wrong?
episodes.description:
The Shakahola Forest massacre refers to the deaths of over 400 people in Kenya, linked to Good News International Ministries, a religious cult led by Pastor Paul Mackenzie. Followers were allegedly coerced into extreme fasting to "meet Jesus," resulting in widespread starvation. Authorities discovered mass graves in the Shakahola Forest, where members had been buried. The case has sparked national and international concern over cult activities and religious extremism in Kenya.

Sources: 
https://www.thecitizen.co.tz/tanzania/news/east-africa-news/-some-of-the-shakahola-cult-victims-had-their-organs-missing--4228052

https://www.aljazeera.com/news/2024/8/12/kenya-cult-leader-paul-mackenzie-on-trial-for-manslaughter

https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2024/08/26/the-cult-in-the-forest

https://www.bbc.com/news/world-africa-68214749

episodes.title: The Deadliest Cult You've Never Heard Of... | A Ugandan Massacre
episodes.description:
This is one of the wildest and most tragic stories I’ve ever come across... Over 900 people died because of a Ugandan cult that claimed the world was ending. They promised salvation but delivered something far darker. From strange rules to apocalyptic predictions, it all led to a horrifying massacre in 2000. Let’s dive into the twisted tale of the Kanungu cult and figure out what really happened.

episodes.title: Commanding a CULT with ONLY His Gaze?!?! | John de Ruiter
episodes.description:
Join me as we chat about the mysterious world of John de Ruiter, the self-proclaimed spiritual leader who built a devoted following through silence and a piercing gaze. From his rise as a global figure to the controversies and serious allegations surrounding his movement, this deep dive explores the blurred lines between faith, manipulation, and power. Is he a guiding light or a master of control?...

episodes.title: A Cult Leader's Resurrection That Ended in Murder: Dark Rituals of the Rosary Prayer Group in Italy
episodes.description:
Lidia Naccarato and her uncle Antonio claimed to receive visions from God, which led to the creation of a cult in Italy. After Antonio's death, Lidia said he revealed through divine messages that he would be resurrected. When the resurrection failed, Antonio revealed in a vision to Lidia that Peter made a pact with Satan and Antonio ordered his murder to "save the world."

When police arrived, they found 30 cult members in white robes standing around an altar with images of saints, while Peter’s body lay sealed in a room.

Please note that this video is intended for entertainment purposes only. All opinions expressed are based on the available information and should not be taken as factual statements. episodes.title: Bizarre UFO Cult that Clones Humans & Claims Aliens Created Us | Raelism
episodes.description:
Only 4% of humanity is intelligent enough to understand their message. Imagine a world where an extraterrestrial species, the Elohim, not only created humanity but did so with advanced technology far beyond our understanding. Described as smaller than humans, with pale green skin and almond-shaped eyes, the Elohim are said to belong to seven distinct races. What secrets are they hiding? Let’s dive into the mysterious world of Raëlism, where science meets religion to create the perfect cult environment.

episodes.title: Inside a Racist, Homophobic, and Abusive Cult: The Twelve Tribes Community and its Disturbing Past
episodes.description:
Get an inside look at the controversial Twelve Tribes community—a religious group often criticized for strict beliefs, cases of child sexual abuse, physical discipline, and disturbing practices. In this video, we explore the allegations of child abuse, racial discrimination, and extreme lifestyle restrictions, along with the hidden ties to popular eateries that help fund their activities. We also take a look at YouTuber Anthony Po, who managed to infiltrate the cult and live with them for a day.

episodes.description:
In this video, we explore the rise of the Buddhafield cult in the 1980s. From the extreme manipulation and mind control by its leader to the unforgivable acts committed, why did members remain in this cult for over 20 years?! We’ll dive into the shocking experiences of former members, their fight to break free, and the lasting effects this group left behind.

episodes.title: The Colt Clan: Disturbing Australian Family Built Through Generational Incest
episodes.description:
Authorities first became aware of the family in June 2010, leading to seven reports of "risk of significant harm." Despite this, an official investigation wasn't launched until July 2012, after a child at a local primary school overheard a disturbing conversation. The child heard another student mention an unkempt girl living in the bush who was pregnant by her brother. The girl also revealed that one of her sisters was pregnant, but they didn’t know which brother was the father.

Follow along as we discuss one of the most disturbing cases of family abuse, neglect, and inbreeding. 

Sources: https://www.dailytelegraph.com.au/news/special-features/top10/exclusive-pictures-from-colt-clan-family-album/image-gallery/3126780d7e45693448a8bc7fecf3e653?page=2
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colt_clan_incest_case
https://www.unilad.com/news/world-news/colt-incest-family-australia-case-733762-20240805
